card.name: Scion of Ugin
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For hundreds of years Ugin slept, encased in the cocoon of stone and magic Sarkhan had created using a shard of a Zendikari hedron. As Ugin lay dormant, his spectral guardians kept vigil.

card.name: Abzan Battle Priest
card.property: Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wherever I walk, the ancestors walk too."

card.name: Abzan Falconer
card.property: Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fastest way across the dunes is above.

card.name: Ainok Bond-Kin
card.property: Outlast {1}{W} ({1}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold the line, for family and the fallen!"

card.name: Ajani's Pridemate
card.property: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When one of us prospers, the pride prospers." —Jazal Goldmane

card.name: Angel of Mercy
card.property: Flying When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every tear shed is a drop of immortality.

card.name: Angelic Accord
card.property: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As demons are drawn to suffering, angels are drawn to acts of benevolence.

card.name: Archangel of Thune
card.property: Flying Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Auriok Champion
card.property: Protection from black and from red Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirrodin's deepest caverns conceal its brightest hopes.

card.name: Austere Command
card.property: Choose two — • Destroy all artifacts. • Destroy all enchantments. • Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less. • Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

card.name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
card.property: Flying, vigilance, indestructible Other permanents you control have indestructible.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.

card.name: Benevolent Ancestor
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although the door is flimsy and the lock pathetically small, Josuri's family never fears the night outside.

card.name: Blinding Mage
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I carry the light of truth. Do not pity those it blinds, for they never had eyes to see."

card.name: Burrenton Forge-Tender
card.property: Protection from red Sacrifice Burrenton Forge-Tender: Prevent all damage a red source of your choice would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are a clachan of smiths. The forge is as comfortable to us as a small fire during a cool winter's evening."

card.name: Disenchant
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tools of evil are mere things. And like all things, they cannot last forever." —Song of All, canto 881

card.name: Doomed Traveler
card.property: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

card.name: Dragon Bell Monk
card.property: Vigilance Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has spent years training his eyes and ears to detect the subtle signs of a dragon's approach.

card.name: Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
card.property: Vigilance Other creatures you control get +2/+2. Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Gitaxians whisper among themselves of other worlds. If they exist, we must bring Phyrexia's magnificence to them."

card.name: Emerge Unscathed
card.property: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Emeria Angel
card.property: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the earth shudders, the sky overflows.

card.name: Great Teacher's Decree
card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Guard Duty
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was told these were standard issue. Do I look standard to you?"

card.name: Guided Strike
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the Ancestor strengthen my hand and guide my blade." —Nomad war prayer

card.name: Infantry Veteran
card.property: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Swords, to me! We must engage their line to protect our archers and mages. Let no one fail this task!"

card.name: Iona's Judgment
card.property: Exile target creature or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beneath the gaze of angels, only the righteous may stand without fear.

card.name: Path of Bravery
card.property: As long as your life total is greater than or equal to your starting life total, creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, you gain life equal to the number of attacking creatures.

card.name: Pentarch Ward
card.property: Enchant creature As Pentarch Ward enters the battlefield, choose a color. When Pentarch Ward enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Pentarch Ward.

card.name: Restoration Angel
card.property: Flash Flying When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Seeker of the Way
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Seeker of the Way gains lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't know where my destiny lies, but I know it isn't here."

card.name: Serra Angel
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

card.name: Serra Ascendant
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) As long as you have 30 or more life, Serra Ascendant gets +5/+5 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Faith in Serra is its own reward.

card.name: Stalwart Aven
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

card.name: Student of Ojutai
card.property: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Human enlightenment is a firefly that sparks in the night. Dragon enlightenment is a beacon that disperses all darkness."

card.name: Survival Cache
card.property: You gain 2 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, draw a card. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Sustainer of the Realm
card.property: Flying Whenever Sustainer of the Realm blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You may break her shield, but you'll never break her spirit.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

card.name: Topan Freeblade
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My scars are my sigils. I will wear them with pride long after you're gone."

card.name: Wing Shards
card.property: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

card.name: Yosei, the Morning Star
card.property: Flying When Yosei, the Morning Star dies, target player skips their next untap step. Tap up to five target permanents that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The caress of the morning star frees all from the clutch of darkness.

card.name: Aetherize
card.property: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can come back once you've learned some manners—and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."

card.name: Amass the Components
card.property: Draw three cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I knew I'd find a use for all that newt spittle!"

card.name: Ancestral Vision
card.property: Suspend 4—{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.) Target player draws three cards.

card.name: Bewilder
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Teferi snapped his fingers, and the viashino started clucking like a chicken. Silly, yes, but exactly the thing we needed to break the stifling tension." —Jhoira, master artificer

card.name: Cephalid Broker
card.property: {T}: Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cephalids value the free exchange of ideas—except for the "free" part.

card.name: Claustrophobia
card.property: Enchant creature When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Condescend
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Shame we'll never see what all the fuss was about."

card.name: Consecrated Sphinx
card.property: Flying Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blessed by the hands of Jin-Gitaxias.

card.name: Cryptic Command
card.property: Choose two — • Counter target spell. • Return target permanent to its owner's hand. • Tap all creatures your opponents control. • Draw a card.

card.name: Day of the Dragons
card.property: When Day of the Dragons enters the battlefield, exile all creatures you control. Then create that many 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying. When Day of the Dragons leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all Dragons you control. Then return the exiled cards to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Diminish
card.property: Target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everything seems a little less ferocious when it's running from a house cat.

card.name: Dissolve
card.property: Counter target spell. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You thought only the gods could stop you?"

card.name: Distortion Strike
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Doorkeeper
card.property: Defender {2}{U}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One piercing stare usually convinces thieves to go elsewhere.

card.name: Elusive Spellfist
card.property: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Elusive Spellfist gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Learn to see an obstacle from a new perspective. Underneath, for example." —Chanyi, Ojutai monk

card.name: Flusterstorm
card.property: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

card.name: Fog Bank
card.property: Defender, flying Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Fog Bank.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The union of sea and sky makes a perfect cover." —Talrand, sky summoner

card.name: Frost Lynx
card.property: When Frost Lynx enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It readily attacks much larger prey, knowing retaliation is impossible.

card.name: Illusory Ambusher
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Whenever Illusory Ambusher is dealt damage, draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Violence is the food it craves. Feed it if you dare." —Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

card.name: Illusory Angel
card.property: Cast this spell only if you've cast another spell this turn. Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In a daze, I woke and looked upon the battlefield, where I could swear my dreams were laying waste to the enemy." —Letter from a soldier

card.name: Jace's Phantasm
card.property: Flying Jace's Phantasm gets +4/+4 as long as an opponent has ten or more cards in their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the abstract memories of the Iquati, Jace found interesting ideas to improve upon.

card.name: Jhessian Thief
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Jhessian Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where's the fun in an escape if it's not at least a little daring?"

card.name: Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
card.property: Flash At the beginning of your end step, draw seven cards. Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by seven.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is not a goal, but a process—the process of creating the perfect Phyrexia."

card.name: Keiga, the Tide Star
card.property: Flying When Keiga, the Tide Star dies, gain control of target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pull of the tide star holds eternal sway.

card.name: Mahamoti Djinn
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

card.name: Mana Drain
card.property: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enthusiasm is no match for preparation.

card.name: Mana Leak
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

card.name: Mnemonic Wall
card.property: Defender When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It augments anamnesis. What is so confusing about that?" —Perisophia the philosopher

card.name: Ojutai's Breath
card.property: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Phantom Monster
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Is it an amalgamation of faded memories or the projection of a half-remembered dream? Neither answer offers any comfort.

card.name: Repeal
card.property: Return target nonland permanent with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be." —Agosto, Azorius imperator

card.name: Riverwheel Aerialists
card.property: Flying Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Adepts of the Riverwheel Stronghold can run through rain and never get wet; masters use the raindrops as stepping stones.

card.name: Shriekgeist
card.property: Flying Whenever Shriekgeist deals combat damage to a player, that player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wounds of the flesh are easy to heal. Wounds of the mind may never be undone.

card.name: Skywise Teachings
card.property: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, create a 2/2 blue Djinn Monk creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ojutai's words must be translated from Draconic before his students can benefit from their wisdom.

card.name: Sphinx of Uthuun
card.property: Flying When Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Teferi, Mage of Zhalfir
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield have flash. Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To save this plane, he must forsake all others.

card.name: Thought Scour
card.property: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As you inject the viscus vitae into the brain stem, don't let the spastic moaning bother you. It will soon become music to your ears." —Stitcher Geralf

card.name: Windfall
card.property: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

card.name: Abyssal Persecutor
card.property: Flying, trample You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His slaves crave death more than they desire freedom. He denies them both.

card.name: Bala Ged Scorpion
card.property: When Bala Ged Scorpion enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fast and lethal, with a penchant for the weak and infirm.

card.name: Balustrade Spy
card.property: Flying When Balustrade Spy enters the battlefield, target player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

card.name: Bladewing's Thrall
card.property: Bladewing's Thrall has flying as long as you control a Dragon. When a Dragon enters the battlefield, you may return Bladewing's Thrall from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A shadow of life chasing a husk of glory.

card.name: Bloodghast
card.property: Bloodghast can't block. Bloodghast has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Bloodghast from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Bogbrew Witch
card.property: {2}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Festering Newt or Bubbling Cauldron, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hardest thing is finding the right ingredients."

card.name: Butcher's Glee
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn. Regenerate it. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Crave made Kneecleaver think she was bigger than the dragon.

card.name: Child of Night
card.property: Lifelink

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

card.name: Dead Reveler
card.property: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He's the unlife of the party.

card.name: Doom Blade
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The void is without substance but cuts like steel.

card.name: Duress
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Eternal Thirst
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has lifelink and "Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature." (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Festering Newt
card.property: When Festering Newt dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. That creature gets -4/-4 instead if you control a creature named Bogbrew Witch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its back bubbles like a witch's cauldron, and it smells just as vile.

card.name: Foul-Tongue Invocation
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand. Target player sacrifices a creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Grisly Spectacle
card.property: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch people flock to a murder scene. Then tell me we're not all a little sick in the head." —Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

card.name: Haunting Hymn
card.property: Target player discards two cards. If you cast this spell during your main phase, that player discards four cards instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hymn's melody has persisted since Tourach's time, but the words changed to invoke the phobias of each listener.

card.name: Indulgent Tormentor
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The promise of anguish is payment enough for services rendered.

card.name: Kokusho, the Evening Star
card.property: Flying When Kokusho, the Evening Star dies, each opponent loses 5 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fall of the evening star never heralds a gentle dawn.

card.name: Lord of the Pit
card.property: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Lord of the Pit. If you can't, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you.

card.name: Mer-Ek Nightblade
card.property: Outlast {B} ({B}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has deathtouch.

card.name: Necropotence
card.property: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Night of Souls' Betrayal
card.property: All creatures get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can we wage war against ourselves? What happens when the kami of our very souls rise against us? I answer simply: We cannot. We die. There can be no victory in this war."—Sensei Hisoka, letter to Lord Konda

card.name: Noxious Dragon
card.property: Flying When Noxious Dragon dies, you may destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragons of Silumgar's brood begin to digest their prey even before consuming it, letting their caustic breath do much of the work.

card.name: Ob Nixilis, the Fallen
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player lose 3 life. If you do, put three +1/+1 counters on Ob Nixilis, the Fallen.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His spark lost, he plots revenge upon the plane whose corrupting mana fractured his soul.

card.name: Phyrexian Rager
card.property: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first." —Sheoldred, Whispering One

card.name: Rakdos Drake
card.property: Flying Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos rioters paint their faces to resemble the drakes' bloodied muzzles.

card.name: Reave Soul
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was not convinced you had a soul until I saw it for myself." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Rotfeaster Maggot
card.property: When Rotfeaster Maggot enters the battlefield, exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain life equal to that card's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Is it at the top of the food chain or the bottom?

card.name: Rune-Scarred Demon
card.property: Flying When Rune-Scarred Demon enters the battlefield, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The litany of the infernal on his flesh pulses to the beating of his dark heart.

card.name: Sanguine Bond
card.property: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blood is constant. Every drop I drink, someone must bleed." —Vradeen, vampire nocturnus

card.name: Sheoldred, Whispering One
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Tavern Swindler
card.property: {T}, Pay 3 life: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 6 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos cultists are her best customers. They never flinch at pain and are seldom good at math.

card.name: Thoughtseize
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."

card.name: Thrill-Kill Assassin
card.property: Deathtouch Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the bounty on Massacre Girl rose, so did the number of imitators.

card.name: Ulcerate
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it were merely lethal, that would be sufficient. The art, however, is in maximizing the suffering it causes." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Virulent Swipe
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Wight of Precinct Six
card.property: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the lost and undead need a protector.

card.name: Wrench Mind
card.property: Target player discards two cards unless they discard an artifact card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What is the sound of one head snapping?

card.name: Anger of the Gods
card.property: Anger of the Gods deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There was no reason to pray. This was already an act of the gods.

card.name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

card.name: Bogardan Hellkite
card.property: Flash Flying When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

card.name: Borderland Marauder
card.property: Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.

card.name: Charmbreaker Devils
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, return an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard to your hand. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Charmbreaker Devils gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Coordinated Assault
card.property: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's hard to shout "Shields up!" with a javelin in your chest.

card.name: Crucible of Fire
card.property: Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dragon is a perfect marriage of power and the will to use it." —Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Draconic Roar
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand. Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to target creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Dragon Egg
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.

card.name: Dragon Tempest
card.property: Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn. Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.

card.name: Dragonlord's Servant
card.property: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Earth elementals have the eternal strength of stone and the endurance of mountains. Primordially connected to the land they inhabit, they take a long-term view of things, scorning the impetuous haste of short-lived mortal creatures.

card.name: Fireball
card.property: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spell fell upon the crowd like a dragon, ancient and full of death.

card.name: Furnace Whelp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Baby dragons can't figure out humans—if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

card.name: Fury Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn. • Remove two time counters from target permanent or suspended card.

card.name: Guttersnipe
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I found a new toy. Wanna play?"

card.name: Hammerhand
card.property: Enchant creature When Hammerhand enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste. (It can attack and {T} no matter when it came under your control.)

card.name: Heat Ray
card.property: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There was clearly a scream. I'm not sure if there was a mouth." —Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

card.name: Hoarding Dragon
card.property: Flying When Hoarding Dragon enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, exile it, then shuffle your library. When Hoarding Dragon dies, you may put the exiled card into its owner's hand.

card.name: Keldon Halberdier
card.property: First strike Suspend 4—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

card.name: Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker
card.property: Haste {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Kiln Fiend
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

card.name: Magus of the Moon
card.property: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tidal forces of the blood moon wrench and buckle the land, drawing monoliths of stone and soil toward the flaming orb.

card.name: Mark of Mutiny
card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flame of anger is hard to douse once lit.

card.name: Monastery Swiftspear
card.property: Haste Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The calligraphy of combat is written with strokes of sudden blood.

card.name: Pillar of Flame
card.property: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion."

card.name: Prodigal Pyromancer
card.property: {T}: Prodigal Pyromancer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What am I looking at? Ashes, dead man."

card.name: Rift Bolt
card.property: Rift Bolt deals 3 damage to any target. Suspend 1—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Ryusei, the Falling Star
card.property: Flying When Ryusei, the Falling Star dies, it deals 5 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The course of the falling star always ends in ruin.

card.name: Scourge of Valkas
card.property: Flying Whenever Scourge of Valkas or another Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control. {R}: Scourge of Valkas gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Splatter Thug
card.property: First strike Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mask isn't meant to hide his identity. It's meant to keep the viscera out of his eyes.

card.name: Staggershock
card.property: Staggershock deals 2 damage to any target. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Surreal Memoir
card.property: Return an instant card at random from your graveyard to your hand. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Thundermaw Hellkite
card.property: Flying Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) When Thundermaw Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each creature with flying your opponents control. Tap those creatures.

card.name: Tormenting Voice
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?" —Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Trumpet Blast
card.property: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do you hear that, Sarkhan? The glory of the horde! I made a legend from what you abandoned." —Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

card.name: Urabrask the Hidden
card.property: Creatures you control have haste. Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Mirran resistance arrived, the furnace dwellers looked to Urabrask for guidance. His decree stunned the others: "Let them be."

card.name: Vent Sentinel
card.property: Defender {1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures with defender you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Zendikar fortifies itself against the Great Threat, making sentries of sky, sea, and stone." —The War Diaries

card.name: Aerial Predation
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the towering trees of the Samok Stand and the predators that guard them, the might of the Ravnican wild has returned.

card.name: Assault Formation
card.property: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power. {G}: Target creature with defender can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. {2}{G}: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Carven Caryatid
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Carven Caryatid enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So-called "old wood" is rare in deforested Ravnica. Statues carved from it are said to house the last of the ancient nature spirits.

card.name: Channel
card.property: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To some mages, the meaning of life is less important than how much is left.

card.name: Crowned Ceratok
card.property: Trample Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best way to calm a rampaging ceratok is to wait until it dies of natural causes.

card.name: Curse of Predation
card.property: Enchant player Whenever a creature attacks enchanted player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hunters feed on the fear of their prey." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Durkwood Baloth
card.property: Suspend 5—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

card.name: Duskdale Wurm
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Last time, it tore up the Wilt-Leaf, turned Mistmeadow into a mudhole, and made the river jump its banks. On the bright side, we were eating venison for weeks." —Donal Alloway, cenn of Kinscaer

card.name: Enlarge
card.property: Target creature gets +7/+7 and gains trample until end of turn. It must be blocked this turn if able. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For Mittens, it was just another day at the beach.

card.name: Genesis Hydra
card.property: When you cast this spell, reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put a nonland permanent card with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle the rest into your library. Genesis Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Genesis Wave
card.property: Reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of permanent cards with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield into your graveyard.

card.name: Greater Basilisk
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bone, stone . . . both taste the same to a hungry basilisk.

card.name: Heroes' Bane
card.property: Heroes' Bane enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {2}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on Heroes' Bane, where X is its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Travelers' tales claim that hydras bite off their own heads to make themselves deadlier.

card.name: Hunt the Weak
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragons scorn the weak, even among their own kind.

card.name: Hunting Pack
card.property: Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

card.name: Inspiring Call
card.property: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now is the hour. Ours is the duty. For victory and family—charge!"

card.name: Ivy Elemental
card.property: Ivy Elemental enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the gardens of the centaurs, many travelers have mysteriously vanished while admiring the elaborate topiaries.

card.name: Jaddi Offshoot
card.property: Defender Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Murasa, even the trees grow trees.

card.name: Jugan, the Rising Star
card.property: Flying When Jugan, the Rising Star dies, you may distribute five +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The light of the rising star empowers the champions of tomorrow.

card.name: Lead the Stampede
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Lotus Cobra
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its scales contain the essence of thousands of lotus blooms.

card.name: Lure
card.property: Enchant creature All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It makes the insignificant conspicuous, the repulsive alluring, and the deadly irresistible.

card.name: Nantuko Shaman
card.property: When Nantuko Shaman enters the battlefield, if you control no tapped lands, draw a card. Suspend 1—{2}{G}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{G}{G} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

card.name: Nature's Claim
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The timeless, tireless jaws of nature shall one day devour us all."—Sildark, artificer of Omu

card.name: Netcaster Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Netcaster Spider blocks a creature with flying, Netcaster Spider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is an expert at culling individuals who stray too far from the herd.

card.name: Obstinate Baloth
card.property: When Obstinate Baloth enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Obstinate Baloth, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.

card.name: Overgrown Battlement
card.property: Defender {T}: Add {G} for each creature with defender you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our enemy is nothing less than the end of all life. We shall not want for allies." —The War Diaries

card.name: Phantom Tiger
card.property: Phantom Tiger enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Tiger, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Tiger.

card.name: Prey's Vengeance
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Primeval Titan
card.property: Trample Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Rampaging Baloths
card.property: Trample Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the land is angry, so are they." —Nissa Revane

card.name: Search for Tomorrow
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Sultai Flayer
card.property: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can have the body, necromancer. I just want the skin."

card.name: Timberland Guide
card.property: When Timberland Guide enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Can you build a fire? Track a deer? Identify killer trees? Then you'll never survive Kessig without me."

card.name: Undercity Troll
card.property: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.) {2}{G}: Regenerate Undercity Troll. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger
card.property: Trample Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced. Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, that land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Wall of Roots
card.property: Defender Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G}. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mana grows and changes like the roots of a plant. Like a plant, it must be nurtured." —Nissa Revane

card.name: Wildsize
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two times the size, four times the smell.

card.name: Azorius Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn. • Draw a card. • Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Bladewing the Risen
card.property: Flying When Bladewing the Risen enters the battlefield, you may return target Dragon permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. {B}{R}: Dragon creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Blizzard Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever Blizzard Specter deals combat damage to a player, choose one — • That player returns a permanent they control to its owner's hand. • That player discards a card.

card.name: Blood Baron of Vizkopa
card.property: Lifelink, protection from white and from black As long as you have 30 or more life and an opponent has 10 or less life, Blood Baron of Vizkopa gets +6/+6 and has flying.

card.name: Chronicler of Heroes
card.property: When Chronicler of Heroes enters the battlefield, draw a card if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She paints pictures with words, though not all pictures show the truth.

card.name: Corpsejack Menace
card.property: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Weakness is not in the nature of the Swarm.

card.name: Electrolyze
card.property: Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet learn something from every lesson they teach.

card.name: Firemane Angel
card.property: Flying, first strike At the beginning of your upkeep, if Firemane Angel is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, you may gain 1 life. {6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return Firemane Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Glimpse the Unthinkable
card.property: Target player puts the top ten cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am confident that if anyone actually penetrates our facades, even the most perceptive would still be fundamentally unprepared for the truth of House Dimir." —Szadek

card.name: Hypersonic Dragon
card.property: Flying, haste You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even this primitive specimen of my kind is impressive." —Niv-Mizzet

card.name: Jungle Barrier
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Jungle Barrier enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Within silent clearings guarded by living palisades, the natural world guards its most precious secrets.

card.name: Knight of the Reliquary
card.property: Knight of the Reliquary gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard. {T}, Sacrifice a Forest or Plains: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knowledge of Bant's landscape and ruins is a weapon that the invaders can't comprehend." —Elspeth Tirel

card.name: Lightning Helix
card.property: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage is not the answer. Rage followed by fitting vengeance is the answer." —Ajani Goldmane

card.name: Malfegor
card.property: Flying When Malfegor enters the battlefield, discard your hand. Each opponent sacrifices a creature for each card discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A demon cannot be trusted, and a dragon will not be ruled.

card.name: Rosheen Meanderer
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}{C}. Spend this mana only on costs that contain {X}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Night after night, Rosheen babbled about a bygone sunlit world, her every word dismissed as a madwoman's ravings.

card.name: Savageborn Hydra
card.property: Double strike Savageborn Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{R/G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Savageborn Hydra. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Simic Sky Swallower
card.property: Flying, trample Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've bred out the shortcomings of the species' natural form and replaced them with assets of our own design." —Momir Vig

card.name: Spiritmonger
card.property: Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger. {B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger. {G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Supreme Verdict
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Destroy all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leonos had no second thoughts about the abolishment edict. He'd left skyrunes warning of the eviction, even though it was cloudy.

card.name: Vizkopa Guildmage
Aether Vial
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Aether Vial. {T}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Bubbling Cauldron
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 4 life. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature named Festering Newt: Each opponent loses 4 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Darksteel Axe

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heavier than it looks, tricky to wield, guaranteed to last.

card.name: Dragonloft Idol
card.property: As long as you control a Dragon, Dragonloft Idol gets +1/+1 and has flying and trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The idols were forged during the time of the Khanfall, when the dragons came to rule Tarkir and its people aligned themselves with the five dragonlords.

card.name: Guardian Idol
card.property: Guardian Idol enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}: Guardian Idol becomes a 2/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn.

card.name: Kolaghan Monument
card.property: {T}: Add {B} or {R}. {4}{B}{R}: Kolaghan Monument becomes a 4/4 black and red Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kolaghan has no lasting home, but her disciples leave relics to mark her conquests.

card.name: Manakin
card.property: {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each night, the artificer tucked the little doll into a locked drawer. Each morning, she awoke to find it waiting beside her with some new bauble." —"The Artificer's Apprentice"

card.name: Mind Stone
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is mana but possibility, an idea not yet given form?" —Jhoira, master artificer

card.name: Mindcrank
card.property: Whenever an opponent loses life, that player puts that many cards from the top of their library into their graveyard. (Damage dealt by sources without infect causes loss of life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let go of your memories and be reborn." —Argent Etchings, plate 106, passage 27

card.name: Mishra's Bauble
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Bauble: Look at the top card of target player's library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Arcum is a babbling fool! Phyrexian technology is our greatest blessing. Take this delightful trinket for instance . . ." —Heidar, Rimewind master

card.name: Moonglove Extract
card.property: Sacrifice Moonglove Extract: It deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.

card.name: Oblivion Stone
card.property: {4}, {T}: Put a fate counter on target permanent. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Oblivion Stone: Destroy each nonland permanent without a fate counter on it, then remove all fate counters from all permanents.

card.name: Palladium Myr
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The myr are like the Glimmervoid: blank canvases on which to build grand creations.

card.name: Pristine Talisman
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tools and artisans can be destroyed, but the act of creation is inviolate." —Elspeth Tirel

card.name: Runed Servitor
card.property: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

card.name: Sandstone Oracle
card.property: Flying When Sandstone Oracle enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. If that player has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.

card.name: Serum Powder
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. Any time you could mulligan and Serum Powder is in your hand, you may exile all the cards from your hand, then draw that many cards. (You can do this in addition to taking mulligans.)

card.name: Star Compass
card.property: Star Compass enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It doesn't point north. It points home.

card.name: Thran Dynamo
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza's metathran children were conceived, birthed, and nurtured by an integrated system of machines.

card.name: Trepanation Blade
card.property: Whenever equipped creature attacks, defending player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card. The creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each card revealed this way. That player puts the revealed cards into their graveyard. Equip {2}

card.name: Azorius Chancery
card.property: Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped. When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{U}.

card.name: Boros Garrison
card.property: Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped. When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{W}.

card.name: Dimir Aqueduct
card.property: Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped. When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{B}.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land is ever resilient. Should it die, it will be reborn.

card.name: Golgari Rot Farm
card.property: Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped. When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{G}.

card.name: Graven Cairns
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {B/R}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{R}, or {R}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shamans of Kar-Sengir claim that their sun sets because it can no longer bear the gaze of those pain-carved cliffs.

card.name: Grove of the Burnwillows
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. Each opponent gains 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spring is the most beautiful season in the grove, when the new leaves open from their ember-buds in a race of leaping flames.

card.name: Gruul Turf
card.property: Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped. When Gruul Turf enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{G}.

card.name: Horizon Canopy
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {W}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Horizon Canopy: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The day is born within its branches.

card.name: Izzet Boilerworks
card.property: Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped. When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{R}.

card.name: Nimbus Maze
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W}. Activate this ability only if you control an Island. {T}: Add {U}. Activate this ability only if you control a Plains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To find its center is to find one's own.

card.name: Orzhov Basilica
card.property: Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield tapped. When Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{B}.

card.name: Radiant Fountain
card.property: When Radiant Fountain enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All peoples treasure a place where the weary traveler may drink in peace." —Ajani Goldmane

card.name: Rakdos Carnarium
card.property: Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield tapped. When Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{R}.

card.name: River of Tears
card.property: {T}: Add {U}. If you played a land this turn, add {B} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Westfolk wept, and their tears wore winding rivers into the cheek of the world."—Glem the Lonebard, "Origins of Kholon"

card.name: Selesnya Sanctuary
card.property: Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped. When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{W}.

card.name: Shimmering Grotto
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.

card.name: Simic Growth Chamber
card.property: Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield tapped. When Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{U}.
